name: ibf_coarse_chan
description: Coarse frequency channel number to start processing for the incoherent beam

name: ibf_nsec
description: Number of seconds to incoherently beamform

name: ibf_nsec_per_output
description: Number of seconds to output per file from the incoherent beamformer

name: cbf_coarse_chan
description: Coarse frequency channel number to start processing for the coherent beam

name: cbf_nsec
description: Number of seconds to coherently beamform

name: cbf_nsec_per_output
description: Number of seconds to output per file from the coherent beamformer

name: min_dm
description: The default minimum DM to search from, in pc/cm^3

name: max_dm
description: The default maximum DM to search to, in pc/cm^3

name: fdas_max_dm
description: Maximum DM to search to for a FDAS search, in pc/cm^3

name: fdas_min_dm
description: Minimum DM to search from for a FDAS search, in pc/cm^3

name: ffa_max_dm
description: Maximum DM to search to for a FFA search, in pc/cm^3

name: ffa_min_dm
description: Minimum DM to search from for a FFA search, in pc/cm^3

name: sps_max_dm
description: Maximum DM to search to for a single-pulse search, in pc/cm^3

name: sps_min_dm
description: Minimum DM to search from a single-pulse search, in pc/cm^3

name: fdas_min_period
description: Minimum period to search for with a FDAS, in seconds

name: fdas_max_period
description: Maximum period to search for with a FDAS, in seconds

name: fdas_nharms
description: Number of harmonics to sum when conducting a FDAS (power of 2)

name: fdas_zmax
description: Maximum Fourier 'acceleration' factor (first time-derivative of Fourier frequency)

name: fdas_zstep
description: Fourier 'acceleration' factor grid step size (interbinning)

name: fdas_wmax
description: Maximum Fourier 'jerk' factor (second time-derivative of Fourier frequency)

name: fdas_wstep
description: Fourier 'jerk' factor grid step size (interbinning)

name: fdas_detection_threshold
description: Detection threshold for Fourier candidates

name: ffa_min_period
description: Minimum period to search for with a FFA search, in seconds

name: ffa_max_period
description: Maximum period to search for with a FFA search, in seconds

name: ffa_detection_threshold
description: Detection threshold for FFA candidates

name: riptide_ffa_config
description: A configuration file for the 'riptide' FFA search engine

name: sps_detrend_length
description: Timeseries detrending length to use for single-pulse search, in samples

name: sps_max_boxcar_width
description: Maximum boxcar width to use for single pulse search, in seconds

name: sps_detection_threshold
description: Detection threshold for SPS candidates
